page.title: 03CLUBS
page.content: A wide variety of clubs cover all aspects of social, political and sporting life for all ages. {POLITICAL-}1 Conservative and 2 Labour clubs {SERVICES-}British Legion, R.F.A. and R.N.A. {SPORTS-}18 hole golf course with clubhouse, cricket, tennis and bowling club.Leyland Motors social and athletic club. {SOCIAL-}A Folk Club and Swinging 60's Night Club meet in 2 public houses every week.15-20 clubs per week meet at the local Leisure Centre.5 clubs for the elderly are run at Prospect House.A large youth centre is run by the county for 12-18 year olds. {CHURCH-}All churches have a wide range of clubs. {CHARITY-}The Round Table and other clubs are held in Leyland.
